name: Live! 3DO Magazine CD-ROM #02
overview: This disc includes demo versions of games: Road Rash, Powers Kingdom, Horde , The, Masters Harukanaru Augusta 3, presumably Furopon World, Burning Soldier, Igo Time Trial Najigo I This also includes a variety of movies about: Jurassic Park Interactive, Shock Wave - Invasion Earth 2019, the Mega Race, Pararancho - of The the Incredible Machine, Sekure Fuumin the no Omocha Hako.
